Name: Zuria
About the game: Build your own unique tank! Using special tool you can create unique shape. With this tool you can: Scale chassis parts Move and rotate any part But you have to follow some rules: Don't leave parts midair Don't make parts intersect each other Dont exceed chassis, movement, weaponry and modules points Following these rules you can immediately test your machine If you are satisfied with results, save and battle with other players!
